ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: asking, 'So when is the Day of Rising?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He asks: "When will the Day of Resurrection be?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He asks: “When will the Day of Resurrection be?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He asks, "When will be the Day of Judgment?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He asks, “When will be the Day of Resurrection?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He asks: "When will be this Day of Resurrection"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He asks: When is the day of resurrection?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: asking, 'When shall be the Day of Resurrection?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He asketh: When will be this Day of Resurrection?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: he asks, "When is this Day of Resurrection to be?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He asketh: when will the Day of Resurrection be?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He asks, ‘When will be this “day of resurrection”?!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He asks: "When will be this Day of Resurrection?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When will the Day of Resurrection be' he asks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He asks, “When is the Day of Resurrection?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:6] He asks, ‘When is the Day of Resurrection?’ — the question is meant in mockery and denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He asketh) 'Adiyy Ibn Rabi'ah asks in his denial of the resurrection: (When will be this Day of Resurrection) when will the Day of Resurrection take place?
